title: International Admission | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Office of International Admission DePaul University serves students from over 104 countries. Our long-standing commitment to diversity and inclusion cultivates a rich and dynamic environment for students to learn and grow into global citizens. At DePaul, your personal and professional development will expand beyond the classroom. Apply to DePaul Are you ready to join the DePaul community and experience life in Chicago? Determine your admission type and learn how to begin your application process today. English Language Academy Our approach to academic English instruction focuses on language skills, university academic and social life, and contemporary American culture. Admission Brochures Undergraduate Learn about DePaul and life in Chicago. Undergraduate e-brochure Information in your language Graduate Explore more than175 graduate-level offered programs. Graduate e-brochure English Language Academy View our visual guides and learn more about our ELA offered courses and resources. ELA e-brochure
